title: my account got hacked, HELP!
body: so I still have access to my account here on the league of legends website/forums. so what happened was I took a couple of weeks off league cause I got burnt out and the other night I got super excited to play league again to only notice that my password didn't work. so I head on the website to change my password to only realize that I was not getting an email. so I did some digging and noticed that the email password and username were all changed, I already submitted a ticket but I have not gotten a response. how can someone change the email/password without me getting an email verification? anyways wanted to post on the forums for more exposure

replies.body: I've seen it happen more than once, but sometimes people hack your personal email first, then issue a standard password reset and such. The zinger here is that they delete the emails as well, leaving no trace. It's good you have a ticket already, those account agents should be able to set everything right again after you verify that you created the account.
how long until I usually get a response?Has been longer than a day already and still nothing
